mapper.select: select id, flag, name, logo, intro, category, scope, scope_id, expire_time, coupon_count, create_time, user_id, user_audit, template_key, target, target_level, send_type, start_time, end_time, limit_money, discount from coupon_template where id = #{id}

select id, flag, name, logo, intro, category, scope, scope_id, expire_time, coupon_count, create_time, user_id, user_audit, template_key, target, target_level, send_type, start_time, end_time, limit_money, discount from coupon_template
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_template(flag, name, logo, intro, category, scope, scope_id, expire_time, coupon_count, create_time, user_id, user_audit, template_key, target, target_level, send_type, start_time, end_time, limit_money, discount) values (#{flag}, #{name}, #{logo}, #{intro}, #{category}, #{scope}, #{scopeId}, #{expireTime}, #{couponCount}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{userAudit}, #{templateKey}, #{target}, #{targetLevel}, #{sendType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{limitMoney}, #{discount})

insert into coupon_template(flag, name, logo, intro, category, scope, scope_id, expire_time, coupon_count, create_time, user_id, user_audit, template_key, target, target_level, send_type, start_time, end_time, limit_money, discount) values
(#{entity.flag}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.intro}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.scope}, #{entity.scopeId}, #{entity.expireTime}, #{entity.couponCount}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userAudit}, #{entity.templateKey}, #{entity.target}, #{entity.targetLevel}, #{entity.sendType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.limitMoney}, #{entity.discount})

insert into coupon_template(flag, name, logo, intro, category, scope, scope_id, expire_time, coupon_count, create_time, user_id, user_audit, template_key, target, target_level, send_type, start_time, end_time, limit_money, discount) values
(#{entity.flag}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.intro}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.scope}, #{entity.scopeId}, #{entity.expireTime}, #{entity.couponCount}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userAudit}, #{entity.templateKey}, #{entity.target}, #{entity.targetLevel}, #{entity.sendType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.limitMoney}, #{entity.discount})
on duplicate key update flag = values(flag), name = values(name), logo = values(logo), intro = values(intro), category = values(category), scope = values(scope), scope_id = values(scope_id), expire_time = values(expire_time), coupon_count = values(coupon_count), create_time = values(create_time), user_id = values(user_id), user_audit = values(user_audit), template_key = values(template_key), target = values(target), target_level = values(target_level), send_type = values(send_type), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), limit_money = values(limit_money), discount = values(discount)
mapper.update:
update coupon_template
flag = #{flag},
name = #{name},
logo = #{logo},
intro = #{intro},
category = #{category},
scope = #{scope},
scope_id = #{scopeId},
expire_time = #{expireTime},
coupon_count = #{couponCount},
create_time = #{createTime},
user_id = #{userId},
user_audit = #{userAudit},
template_key = #{templateKey},
target = #{target},
target_level = #{targetLevel},
send_type = #{sendType},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
limit_money = #{limitMoney},
discount = #{discount},
where id = #{id}
